016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
019import java.util.ArrayList;
020import java.util.HashMap;
021import java.util.Map;
022import java.util.Map.Entry;
023
024/**
025 * A functional group of a fatty acid, it can contain nested functional groups.
026 *
027 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
028 * @author Nils Hoffmann
029 */
030public class FunctionalGroup {
031
032    protected String name;
033    protected int position = -1;
034    protected int count;
035    protected String stereochemistry;
036    protected String ringStereo;
037    protected DoubleBonds doubleBonds;
038    protected boolean atomic;
039    protected ElementTable elements;
040    protected Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> functionalGroups;
041    protected KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups;
042
043    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
044        this(_name, -1, 1, null, false, "", null, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
045    }
046
047    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
048        this(_name, _position, _count, null, false, "", null, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
049    }
050
051    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, DoubleBonds _double_bonds, boolean _is_atomic, String _stereochemistry, ElementTable _elements, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
052        this(_name, _position, _count, _double_bonds, _is_atomic, _stereochemistry, _elements, null, knownFunctionalGroups);
053    }
054
055    public FunctionalGroup(String _name, int _position, int _count, DoubleBonds _double_bonds, boolean _is_atomic, String _stereochemistry, ElementTable _elements, HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> _functional_groups, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
056        name = _name;
057        position = _position;
058        count = _count;
059        stereochemistry = _stereochemistry;
060        ringStereo = "";
061        doubleBonds = (_double_bonds != null) ? _double_bonds : new DoubleBonds(0);
062        atomic = _is_atomic;
063        elements = (_elements != null) ? _elements : new ElementTable();
064        functionalGroups = (_functional_groups != null) ? _functional_groups : (new HashMap<>());
065        this.knownFunctionalGroups = knownFunctionalGroups;
066    }
067
068    public FunctionalGroup copy() {
069        DoubleBonds db = doubleBonds.copy();
070        HashMap<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> fg = new HashMap<>();
071        functionalGroups.entrySet().stream().map(kv -> {
072            fg.put(kv.getKey(), new ArrayList<>());
073            return kv;
074        }).forEachOrdered(kv -> {
075            kv.getValue().forEach(func_group -> {
076                fg.get(kv.getKey()).add(func_group.copy());
077            });
078        });
079        ElementTable e = new ElementTable();
080        elements.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
081            e.put(kv.getKey(), kv.getValue());
082        });
083
084        FunctionalGroup func_group_new = new FunctionalGroup(name, position, count, db, atomic, stereochemistry, e, fg, knownFunctionalGroups);
085        func_group_new.ringStereo = ringStereo;
086        return func_group_new;
087    }
088
089    public void setName(String name) {
090        this.name = name;
091    }
092
093    public String getName() {
094        return this.name;
095    }
096
097    public void setPosition(int position) {
098        this.position = position;
099    }
100
101    public int getPosition() {
102        return this.position;
103    }
104
105    public void setCount(int count) {
106        this.count = count;
107    }
108
109    public int getCount() {
110        return this.count;
111    }
112
113    @JsonIgnore
114    public String getStereochemistry() {
115        return stereochemistry;
116    }
117
118    public void setStereochemistry(String stereochemistry) {
119        this.stereochemistry = stereochemistry;
120    }
121
122    @JsonIgnore
123    public String getRingStereo() {
124        return ringStereo;
125    }
126
127    public void setRingStereo(String ringStereo) {
128        this.ringStereo = ringStereo;
129    }
130
131    public DoubleBonds getDoubleBonds() {
132        return this.doubleBonds;
133    }
134
135    public void setDoubleBonds(DoubleBonds doubleBonds) {
136        this.doubleBonds = doubleBonds;
137    }
138
139    public void setAtomic(boolean atomic) {
140        this.atomic = atomic;
141    }
142
143    @JsonIgnore
144    public boolean isAtomic() {
145        return this.atomic;
146    }
147
148    @JsonIgnore
149    public ElementTable getElements() {
150        return this.elements;
151    }
152
153    public void setElements(ElementTable elements) {
154        this.elements = elements;
155    }
156
157    @JsonIgnore
158    public ElementTable computeAndCopyElements() {
159        computeElements();
160        ElementTable _elements = elements.copy();
161        _elements.add(getFunctionalGroupElements());
162        return _elements;
163    }
164
165    public void shiftPositions(int shift) {
166        position += shift;
167        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
168            kv.getValue().forEach(fg -> {
169                fg.shiftPositions(shift);
170            });
171        });
172    }
173
174    /**
175     * Return the total count for the given functional group name, or 0.
176     * @param functionalGroup the functional group name.
177     * @return the total count
178     */
179    public Integer getTotalFunctionalGroupCount(String functionalGroup) {
180        if ("[X]".equals(functionalGroup)) {
181            return 0;
182        } else if (functionalGroups.containsKey(functionalGroup)) {
183            return functionalGroups.get(functionalGroup).stream().map(fg -> fg.getCount()).reduce(0, Integer::sum);
184        } else {
185            return 0;
186        }
187    }
188
189    /**
190     * Returns a copy of the internally used functional groups map, with the virtual [X] group for regular LCBs removed.
191     * @return a copy of the internal functional groups
192     * @see #getFunctionalGroupsInternal() to obtain the internal datastructure by reference.
193     */
194    public Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> getFunctionalGroups() {
195        Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> mapCopy = new HashMap<>(functionalGroups);
196        mapCopy.remove("[X]");
197        return mapCopy;
198    }
199    
200    /**
201     * Returns the internal representation of the functional groups, including the virtual [X] group for regular LCBs.
202     * @return the internal datastructure by reference.
203     */
204    @JsonIgnore
205    public Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> getFunctionalGroupsInternal() {
206        return functionalGroups;
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * Set the internal functional groups.
211     * @param functionalGroups the functional groups to set
212     */
213    public void setFunctionalGroups(Map<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> functionalGroups) {
214        this.functionalGroups = functionalGroups;
215    }
216
217    @JsonIgnore
218    public ElementTable getFunctionalGroupElements() {
219        ElementTable _elements = new ElementTable();
220
221        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
222            kv.getValue().forEach(func_group -> {
223                _elements.add(func_group.computeAndCopyElements(), func_group.count);
224            });
225        });
226
227        return _elements;
228    }
229
230    public void computeElements() {
231        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
232            kv.getValue().forEach(func_group -> {
233                func_group.computeElements();
234            });
235        });
236    }
237
238    public String toString(LipidLevel level) {
239        String fg_string = "";
240        if (LipidLevel.isLevel(level, LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE.level | LipidLevel.FULL_STRUCTURE.level)) {
241            if ('0' <= name.charAt(0) && name.charAt(0) <= '9') {
242                fg_string = (position > -1) ? (Integer.toString(position) + ringStereo + "(" + name + ")") : name;
243            } else {
244                fg_string = (position > -1) ? (Integer.toString(position) + ringStereo + name) : name;
245            }
246        } else {
247            fg_string = (count > 1) ? ("(" + name + ")" + Integer.toString(count)) : name;
248        }
249        if (stereochemistry.length() > 0 && level == LipidLevel.COMPLETE_STRUCTURE) {
250            fg_string += "[" + stereochemistry + "]";
251        }
252
253        return fg_string;
254    }
255
256    public int getNDoubleBonds() throws ConstraintViolationException {
257        int db = count * doubleBonds.getNumDoubleBonds();
258        for (Entry<String, ArrayList<FunctionalGroup>> kv : functionalGroups.entrySet()) {
259            for (FunctionalGroup func_group : kv.getValue()) {
260                db += func_group.getNDoubleBonds();
261            }
262        }
263
264        return db;
265    }
266
267    public void addPosition(int pos) {
268        position += (position >= pos) ? 1 : 0;
269
270        functionalGroups.entrySet().forEach(kv -> {
271            kv.getValue().forEach(fg -> {
272                fg.addPosition(pos);
273            });
274        });
275    }
276
277}
